# Static Assets

This folder contains static assets that will be copied as-is to the build output.

## Structure

- `img/` - Images (logo, favicon, social cards, etc.)

## Usage

Files in `static/img/logo.png` will be accessible at `/img/logo.png` in the final site.

## Common Files

- `img/logo.png` - Main logo
- `img/favicon.ico` - Site favicon
- `img/opentryon-social-card.jpg` - Social media preview image
